about_the_game:
Play as Coz the Cosmic Kitten as you travel the solar system reconnecting the universe together.



The ancient guardian of the Milky Way, known as the Galaxy Cat, will sometimes sleep for millennia. During one of their catnaps, a massive meteor tore through a solar system, leaving it in ruins and breaking the bonds that hold the various Sectors together. Upon waking and realizing their mistake, the Galaxy Cat repaired the planets, but they were too large to collect the scattered energy that powered the portals between the Sectors. So, they created the Cosmic Kitten, a being composed of stardust and energy, to travel the solar system and restart the portals.

Play through 50+ single-screen platforming challenges, collecting energy fragments along the way.
detailed_description:
Play as Coz the Cosmic Kitten as you travel the solar system reconnecting the universe together.



The ancient guardian of the Milky Way, known as the Galaxy Cat, will sometimes sleep for millennia. During one of their catnaps, a massive meteor tore through a solar system, leaving it in ruins and breaking the bonds that hold the various Sectors together. Upon waking and realizing their mistake, the Galaxy Cat repaired the planets, but they were too large to collect the scattered energy that powered the portals between the Sectors. So, they created the Cosmic Kitten, a being composed of stardust and energy, to travel the solar system and restart the portals.

Play through 50+ single-screen platforming challenges, collecting energy fragments along the way.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz+, 64-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1300/NVIDIA GeForce 6600 GT/Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz+, 64-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1300/NVIDIA GeForce 6600 GT/Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Galaxy Cat
